com.here.android.mpa.mapping

Class OnMapRenderListener.OnMapRenderListenerAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.here.android.mpa.mapping.OnMapRenderListener.OnMapRenderListenerAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OnMapRenderListener
    Enclosing interface:
    OnMapRenderListener

    public abstract static class OnMapRenderListener.OnMapRenderListenerAdapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements OnMapRenderListener
    Default implementation for the OnMapRenderListener interface. Users may use this abstract class and overload specific methods to have a smaller code footprint.
    See Also:
    OnMapRenderListener

    • Method Detail

      • onPreDraw

        public void onPreDraw()
        Description copied from interface: OnMapRenderListener
        Callback indicating that a Map drawing event is about to occur. Applications can perform custom rendering when this callback is sent.

        This callback is preferred to OnMapRenderListener.onPostDraw(boolean, long) when making changes to MapObjects as the changes can be made during the upcoming draw and another Map invalidation will not need to take place.

        Note: This callback is made on the rendering thread.

        Specified by:
        onPreDraw in interface OnMapRenderListener

      • onPostDraw

        public void onPostDraw(boolean invalidated,
              long renderTime)
        Description copied from interface: OnMapRenderListener
        Callback indicating that a Map drawing event has ended. Applications can perform custom rendering when this callback is sent.

        Note: This callback is made on the rendering thread.

        Specified by:
        onPostDraw in interface OnMapRenderListener
        Parameters:
        invalidated - A boolean specifying whether the map is invalidated and will redraw
        renderTime - The time taken to render the map

      • onSizeChanged

        public void onSizeChanged(int width,
                 int height)
        Description copied from interface: OnMapRenderListener
        Callback indicating that a Map size has changed following a rotation. Applications can perform custom rendering when this callback is sent.

        Note: This callback is made on the UI thread.

        Specified by:
        onSizeChanged in interface OnMapRenderListener
        Parameters:
        width - A post-rotation width
        height - A post-rotation height

      • onGraphicsDetached

        public void onGraphicsDetached()
        Description copied from interface: OnMapRenderListener
        Callback indicating that the map renderer has been cleanly detached from the view.
        Specified by:
        onGraphicsDetached in interface OnMapRenderListener

      • onRenderBufferCreated

        public void onRenderBufferCreated()
        Description copied from interface: OnMapRenderListener
        Callback indicating that the map render buffer has been created.

        Note: This callback is made on the rendering thread.

        Specified by:
        onRenderBufferCreated in interface OnMapRenderListener
